subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: India became the first team to qualify for the World Twenty20 semifinals after half-centuries from Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma secured a comprehensive victory over host Bangladesh in Mirpur.
snippet: India became the first team to qualify for the World Twenty20 semifinals after half-centuries from Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma secured a comprehensive victory over host Bangladesh in Mirpur.
